PersonalStatement.text: Kelly Bell, born on 1963-12-10, is a Female based in Martinezport, Burkina Faso. She is Divorced and holds Swiss nationality. Currently working at Peck, Clements and Wong.

WorkExperience.text: Marketing Specialist at Peters Inc from 2006 to 2017.
Senior Project Manager at Peck, Clements and Wong, 2018 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Financial Economics from King's College London
Master's in Engineering from Universidad Nacional de Córdoba - UNC

PersonalSkills.text: Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys coding personal projects.
